pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Patronus Installer is a full-featured TUI/CLI installer for the Patronus firewall and SD-WAN system. It provides:
- Interactive terminal-based installation wizard - Automatic disk detection and partitioning - UEFI and BIOS boot support - Multiple filesystem support (ext4, btrfs, xfs) - Network configuration - Service configuration - Unattended installation via config file
